text:
At present the vajload task needs version number in order to load a project. 
I've modified the source code to load open edition of a project if the version 
number is not specified. I can submit the code when required.
creator: Mehmood.Shaikh@ccra-adrc.gc.ca
bodewig@apache.org
text:
You can now specify * for the latest versioned and ** for the latest unversioned
edition.  Available in source-download 2003-05-07, unfortunately we don't ship
the VAJ classes with our nightly builds.
